items.summary: Fix the app-wide loading gate so the UI does not get stuck on the global “Loading…” screen when the backend actor is temporarily null/unavailable during initialization; the Home page (and other routes) must still render in a fail-open manner unless the backend explicitly reports decommissioning.

Ensure the top-of-homepage VotingPromoSection (including LivePollWidget and LiveVotingResultsWidget) always displays a clear UI state for loading, empty data, and errors instead of rendering nothing; all user-facing messages must be in English.

Replace silent rendering failures with visible fallbacks for notification UI: if NotificationPanelErrorBoundary catches an error, show a small inline fallback message (in English) rather than returning null so users do not experience missing UI with no explanation.
